name: Jet Go! X ( Still Demo )
description:
This is the game i've maked for #remakejam.

Oh, so i need to put something here?

Ummmm ...

This is a remake of my first "full" ( if i can say that ) game i ever created ( other ones were scrap stuff )

If you wanna create a game like this you need :

  • A toaster ( or how do you like to call it, a computer )
  • A LOT OF FREE TIME
  • And two hands ( if you want you can use three of it )

and... Idk, i thinked i can make it 100 times better and i did it, and im proud of this "thing".

BTW THIS ISN'T MINECRAFT

ENJOY ! :D
